name: Oak Tank Test
description:
Hi guys this is our Tank game in development. Please try and give feedback so we can improve it for your entertainment!

How to win:
As you destroy enemy units you gain shield that is attached to your character. When your vehicle is low in power you should find first unused vehicle. Be careful while you are without vehicle you can get smashed.

Oak Tank game is:

  • arcade
  • 2 types of tanks and helicopter
  • 4 types of power up
  • active switching vehicles
  • escaping the vehicle before it explode
  • run over enemies while they are searching for good tanks
  • new controls more feedom in Reborns

x64 and 32b release (works hopefully)

Controls:

Move - AWSD and ← ↑ ↓ →
Shoot - Space Bar
Exit vehicle - E and Enter
Reset game - Esc

You can find developer at:

https://twitter.com/Slobdanilinista
https://www.facebook.com/slobacarfree

You allso can learn gamedev from this developer at:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtaKBK59ofowCbnuG...
